detailsData.title: Real Success
detailsData.content: Over the past three decades, we have obtained more multi-million dollar verdicts and settlements for our clients than any other firm in Northern California.

detailsData.title: Extensive Experience
detailsData.content: We have in-depth experience in all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, big and small.

detailsData.title: Responsiveness
detailsData.content: You can count on working with your own lawyer and receiving prompt responses to your inquiries and concerns.

detailsData.title: Nationwide Representation
detailsData.content: While our main office is in Sacramento, California, we serve clients throughout the state and across the U.S.

subHeading: Northern California's Most Trusted Injury Attorneys
valueProp: At Dreyer Babich Buccola Wood Campora, LLP we aggressively represent clients who have suffered personal injuries or the loss of a loved one in virtually every type of case. We have a national reputation for our attaining record-setting results in high profile and catastrophic injury cases, but also pride ourselves in our handling of smaller, but meritorious, non-permanent injury cases for those in need.

testimonalData.text: I would definitely recommend Dreyer Babich Buccola Wood Campora to anyone looking for a firm with integrity, honesty, and compassion.
testimonalData.author: Former Client

testimonalData.text: I cannot express enough gratitude for his exceptional support and expertise.
testimonalData.author: Anonymous

testimonalData.text: Thank you and your staff for all your work on our behalf.
testimonalData.author: Jess
